keyFacts: This email concerns the installation of new video recording hardware at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The primary goal is to restore recording to all channels, with redundancy and PTZ control conversion to follow.
The correspondence is dated August 11, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the MCC on August 10, 2019.
The existing analog system was to continue recording until the new system was ready for cutover.
The document suggests an upgrade or repair to the facility's surveillance recording capabilities was underway.
